name: Rayman: Hoodlum's Revenge
description: The Hoodlums have returned to take over the world, and only Rayman can stop them. From a new 3D perspective, you can guide Rayman or Globox through 16 intense levels rife with Hoodlum armies. Rayman: Hoodlum's Revenge features new power-ups--including super-speed and fire resistance--that can help you defeat enemies.
